languages.text: "И если уж на то пошло... в какой момент, шерин, вы планировали раскрыть мне свою истинную личность?" {n}Джай заинтересованно склоняет голову набок.{/n} "Мне бесконечно льстит ваше внимание, но знай я, что говорю с {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольным Торговцем{/g}, а не {mf|его|ее} представителем, примернее следила бы за своим поведением..."

traits.locale_text: "И если уж на то пошло... в какой момент, шерин, вы планировали раскрыть мне свою истинную личность?" {n}Джай заинтересованно склоняет голову набок.{/n} "Мне бесконечно льстит ваше внимание, но, знай я, что говорю с Вольным Торговцем, а не {mf|его|ее} представителем, примернее следила бы за своим поведением..."

languages.text: "And while we're at it... shereen, when were you going to reveal your true identity to me?" {n}Jae cocks her head to one side curiously.{/n} "I am infinitely flattered by your attention, but if I had known I was talking to a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}, not an envoy of one, I would've shown some decorum..."
languages.original_text: "И если уж на то пошло... в какой момент, шерин, вы планировали раскрыть мне свою истинную личность?" {n}Джай заинтересованно склоняет голову набок.{/n} "Мне бесконечно льстит ваше внимание, но знай я, что говорю с {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольным Торговцем{/g}, а не {mf|его|ее} представителем, примернее следила бы за своим поведением..."

traits.locale_text: "And while we're at it... shereen, when were you going to reveal your true identity to me?" {n}Jae cocks her head to one side curiously.{/n} "I am infinitely flattered by your attention, but if I had known I was talking to a Rogue Trader, not an envoy of one, I would've shown some decorum..."

"And while we're at it... shereen, when were you going to reveal your true identity to me?" {n}Jae cocks her head to one side curiously.{/n} "I am infinitely flattered by your attention, but if I had known I was talking to a Rogue Trader, not an envoy of one, I would've shown some decorum..."

"And while we're at it... shereen, when were you going to reveal your true identity to me?" {n}Jae cocks her head to one side curiously.{/n} "I am infinitely flattered by your attention, but if I had known I was talking to a Rogue Trader, not an envoy of one, I would've shown some decorum..."

"And while we're at it... shereen, when were you going to reveal your true identity to me?" {n}Jae cocks her head to one side curiously.{/n} "I am infinitely flattered by your attention, but if I had known I was talking to a Rogue Trader, not an envoy of one, I would've shown some decorum..."

"And while we're at it... shereen, when were you going to reveal your true identity to me?" {n}Jae cocks her head to one side curiously.{/n} "I am infinitely flattered by your attention, but if I had known I was talking to a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}, not an envoy of one, I would've shown some decorum..."

languages.text: “另外话说回来……亲爱的，你究竟打算什么时候向我透露你的真实身份呢？”{n}婕伊好奇地将头转向一旁。{/n}“你的关注真的让我受宠若惊。不过，如果我当时知道我面前的人就是{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}，而不是行商浪人的特使，我恐怕会表现得更有礼数……”
languages.original_text: "And while we're at it... shereen, when were you going to reveal your true identity to me?" {n}Jae cocks her head to one side curiously.{/n} "I am infinitely flattered by your attention, but if I had known I was talking to a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}, not an envoy of one, I would've shown some decorum..."

traits.locale_text: “另外话说回来……亲爱的，你究竟打算什么时候向我透露你的真实身份呢？”{n}婕伊好奇地将头转向一旁。{/n}“你的关注真的让我受宠若惊。不过，如果我当时知道我面前的人就是{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}，而不是行商浪人的特使，我恐怕会表现得更有礼数……”

languages.text: «Y ya que estamos, shereen, ¿cuándo me iba a revelar su verdadera identidad?». {n}Jae, con curiosidad, inclina la cabeza.{/n} «Me halaga muchísimo su atención, pero, de haber sabido que estaba hablando con {mf|un|una} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g}, no {mf|el|la} enviad{mf|o|a} de uno, habría mostrado más decoro...».
languages.original_text: "And while we're at it... shereen, when were you going to reveal your true identity to me?" {n}Jae cocks her head to one side curiously.{/n} "I am infinitely flattered by your attention, but if I had known I was talking to a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}, not an envoy of one, I would've shown some decorum..."

traits.locale_text: «Y ya que estamos, shereen, ¿cuándo me iba a revelar su verdadera identidad?». {n}Jae, con curiosidad, inclina la cabeza.{/n} «Me halaga muchísimo su atención, pero, de haber sabido que estaba hablando con {mf|un|una} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g}, no {mf|el|la} enviad{mf|o|a} de uno, habría mostrado más decoro...».

languages.text: 「ちょっと…シャリーン、いつ自分の正体を言うつもりだったのさ？」{n}ジェイは不思議そうに頭を横に傾ける。{/n}「アンタの気持ちはとてもとても光栄だけどね、相手が{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}の使節じゃなくて、自由開拓者本人だと知っていたら、ある程度の礼儀は示したよ…」
languages.original_text: "And while we're at it... shereen, when were you going to reveal your true identity to me?" {n}Jae cocks her head to one side curiously.{/n} "I am infinitely flattered by your attention, but if I had known I was talking to a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}, not an envoy of one, I would've shown some decorum..."

traits.locale_text: 「ちょっと…シャリーン、いつ自分の正体を言うつもりだったのさ？」{n}ジェイは不思議そうに頭を横に傾ける。{/n}「アンタの気持ちはとてもとても光栄だけどね、相手が{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}の使節じゃなくて、自由開拓者本人だと知っていたら、ある程度の礼儀は示したよ…」

languages.text: "Und wenn wir schon dabei sind ... Shereen, wann wolltet Ihr mir Eure wahre Identität offenbaren?" {n}Jae legt neugierig den Kopf auf die Seite.{/n} "Eure Aufmerksamkeit schmeichelt mir unendlich, aber wenn ich gewusst hätte, dass ich mit {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|einem Freihändler|einer Freihändlerin}{/g} spreche und nicht nur mit {mf|einem Vertreter|einer Vertreterin}, hätte ich mich um mehr Anstand bemüht ..."
languages.original_text: "And while we're at it... shereen, when were you going to reveal your true identity to me?" {n}Jae cocks her head to one side curiously.{/n} "I am infinitely flattered by your attention, but if I had known I was talking to a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}, not an envoy of one, I would've shown some decorum..."

traits.locale_text: "Und wenn wir schon dabei sind ... Shereen, wann wolltet Ihr mir Eure wahre Identität offenbaren?" {n}Jae legt neugierig den Kopf auf die Seite.{/n} "Eure Aufmerksamkeit schmeichelt mir unendlich, aber wenn ich gewusst hätte, dass ich mit {mf|einem Freihändler|einer Freihändlerin} spreche und nicht nur mit {mf|einem Vertreter|einer Vertreterin}, hätte ich mich um mehr Anstand bemüht ..."

languages.text: « Et tant que nous y sommes... Dites-moi, shereen, à quel moment est-ce que vous comptiez me dévoiler votre véritable identité ? » {n}Jae penche la tête sur le côté, intriguée.{/n} « Votre attention est incroyablement flatteuse, mais si j'avais su que je m'adressais à {mf|un|une} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}{/g}, plutôt qu'à son émissaire, j'aurais fait plus attention à l'étiquette... »
languages.original_text: "And while we're at it... shereen, when were you going to reveal your true identity to me?" {n}Jae cocks her head to one side curiously.{/n} "I am infinitely flattered by your attention, but if I had known I was talking to a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}, not an envoy of one, I would've shown some decorum..."

traits.locale_text: « Et tant que nous y sommes... Dites-moi, shereen, à quel moment est-ce que vous comptiez me dévoiler votre véritable identité ? » {n}Jae penche la tête sur le côté, intriguée.{/n} « Votre attention est incroyablement flatteuse, mais si j'avais su que je m'adressais à {mf|un|une} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}{/g}, plutôt qu'à son émissaire, j'aurais fait plus attention à l'étiquette... »

languages.text: "Hazır başlamışken... Şirinim, gerçek kimliğini bana ne zaman açıklayacaktın?" {n}Jae, merakla başını yana eğiyor.{/n} "İlgin beni ziyadesiyle gururlandırdı ama elçisiyle değil de {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir'in{/g} kendisiyle konuştuğumu bilsem daha edepli davranırdım."
languages.original_text: "And while we're at it... shereen, when were you going to reveal your true identity to me?" {n}Jae cocks her head to one side curiously.{/n} "I am infinitely flattered by your attention, but if I had known I was talking to a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}, not an envoy of one, I would've shown some decorum..."

traits.locale_text: "Hazır başlamışken... Şirinim, gerçek kimliğini bana ne zaman açıklayacaktın?" {n}Jae merakla başını yana eğiyor.{/n} "İlgin beni ziyadesiyle gururlandırdı ama elçisiyle değil de {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g}'in kendisiyle konuştuğumu bilsem daha edepli davranırdım."
